h3_39: University of Missouri-Columbia School of Medicine
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_80: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Our residency program is rooted in strong traditions of clinical excellence. Residents receive comprehensive training in all pillars of dermatology. We are a national leader in teledermatology and our residents also partake in multi-disciplinary clinics. Continuity clinics start in the first month of training and extend throughout training and a formal mentorship program is utilized. The curriculum is broad and diverse, including practice management, wellness and leadership development topics.

p_351: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
